title: Noam Chomsky on CRT, Free Speech, DeSantis
description:
Piers Morgan and Noam Chomsky discuss issues of free speech, education, 
Critical Race Theory, and propaganda. Chomsky claims that free speech
is mainly under attack by the right wing,  but that a minority of leftists 
are also attacking it.  As a phrase, 'critical race theory' is a slogan of the 
right wing.  Conservatives use 'CRT' as a scapegoat for everything they 
don't like.  As a discipline, Critical Race Theory is a small academic 
movement that has been around for the last 50 or so years.  Critical Race 
Theory is not taught at any primary or secondary schools. Conservatives 
are really looking to forward non-critical approaches to American history. 
They want elementary schools to teach students how great America is.
